Name: Pin TeamCity Build Version and Dependencies
Description:
Try to pin the TeamCity build version and dependencies
(Requires Octopus version to match TeamCity version)
Author: roberto-mardeni

Parameters.Name: buildTypeId
Parameters.Label: Build Configuration ID
Parameters.HelpText:
The build configuration id to look for the build to pin.

General Settings of the Build Configuration

Parameters.Name: TeamCityUrl
Parameters.Label: Url of TeamCity Server
Parameters.HelpText: The url to the TeamCity server.

Parameters.Name: TeamCityUser
Parameters.Label: TeamCity User
Parameters.HelpText: The TeamCity user used for pinning the build

Parameters.Name: TeamCityPassword
Parameters.Label: TeamCity User Password
Parameters.HelpText: The password for the TeamCity user.

Parameters.Name: TeamCityTags
Parameters.Label: TeamCity Tags
Parameters.HelpText: Tags to add to the TeamCity Build, space separated list of values.
